title: Evgeny Elgin
text:
Evgeny Elgin also spelled as Evgeni Elgin (born 10 March 1987) is a <a href="Russian%20people">Russian</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who generally plays as a <a href="lock%20%28rugby%20union%29">lock</a> represents <a href="Russia%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Russia</a> internationally.
He was included in the <a href="2019%20Rugby%20World%20Cup%20squads">Russian squad</a> for the <a href="2019%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2019 Rugby World Cup</a> which was held in Japan for the first time and also marked his first World Cup appearance. 
Career.
He made his international debut for Russia against <a href="Germany%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Germany</a> on 13 February 2016.
Honours
References.
